casebody.data:
T. B. SUMMERS v. IGNATIUS BROWN [No. 9,

January Term, 1936.]

Decided February 6th, 1936.

The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Urner, Offutt, Parke, Sloan, Mitchell, and Shehan, JJ.

Samuel J. Aaron, with whom was Howard L. Aaron on the brief, for the appellant. Ben B. Sellman, with whom was Samuel S. Levin on the brief, for the appellee. Bond, C. J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
